QUESTION: The ability for businesses to rent computing services and software from a cloud service provider on a per unit or per month basis is best encapsulated by which of the following cloud business enablers?

Collaboration software such as Zoom, Mural, and Slack are all cloud services that facilitate team communication and information sharing in real-time. This benefit of cloud is best encapsulated by which of the following cloud business enablers?
Company X owns and manages all its hardware and software, which are housed in an onsite Data Center. Which of the following describes the IT infrastructure that Company X employs?
An organization using Traditional IT infrastructure may choose not to adopt a cloud deployment model for all of the following reasons EXCEPT:
OPTION0: The system works just fine as is
OPTION1: Cloud Service Providers often lock organizations into lengthy and expensive contracts
OPTION2: Cloud migration is seen as being too costly and time-consuming
OPTION3: The data owned by the organization is too sensitive to be trusted to a third-party provider

QUESTION: Infrastructure as a service (IaaS) provides companies _________________.
OPTION0: With computing resources including servers, networking, storage, and data center space on a pay-per-use basis.
OPTION1: Distant computers “in the cloud“ that are owned and operated by others and that connect to a users‘ computer via the Internet and usually a web browser
OPTION2: A cloud-based environment with everything required to support the complete lifecycle of building and delivering web-based (cloud) applications

QUESTION: Which of the following cloud delivery models provides sophisticated security and governance designed for a company’s specific requirements?

Acme Hospital is looking to migrate some of its workloads to the cloud. After consulting with a cloud development team, they decide on a model where general information apps will be hosted on a public cloud but sensitive data such as patient records will be stored on a private cloud. Which cloud deployment model has Acme Hospital chosen?

Which of the following cloud service types addresses the user who does not pay for the software itself? It works like a rental. They have the authorization to use it for a period of time and pay for the software that they are using.

_______ as a service is primarily designed for developers looking to build an application but offloads infrastructure management, patches, updates, and other administrative tasks to the cloud service provider.
